418 
419     def create_jwt_token(
420         self,
421         user_id: str,
422         token_type: str = "access",
423         additional_claims: dict[str, Any] = None
424     ) -> AuthToken:
425         """Create JWT token for user."""
426 
427         now = datetime.now(UTC)
428 
429         if token_type == "access":
430             expire_delta = timedelta(minutes=self.jwt_access_token_expire)
431         elif token_type == "refresh":
432             expire_delta = timedelta(days=self.jwt_refresh_token_expire)
433         else:
434             expire_delta = timedelta(hours=1)
435 
436         expires_at = now + expire_delta
437 
438         payload = {
439             'sub': user_id,
440             'type': token_type,
441             'iat': now,
442             'exp': expires_at,
443             'iss': 'agentic-startup-studio',
444             'aud': 'agentic-startup-studio'
445         }
446 
447         if additional_claims:
448             payload.update(additional_claims)
449 
450         token = jwt.encode(payload, self.jwt_secret, algorithm=self.jwt_algorithm)
451 
452         return AuthToken(
453             token=token,
454             token_type=token_type,
455             user_id=user_id,
456             expires_at=expires_at,
457             scopes=additional_claims.get('scopes', []) if additional_claims else [],
458             metadata={'created_at': now.isoformat()}
459         )
460
